section.title: Overview
section.p: Rate defines the amount of currency to be charged for each unit of consumption by a call. For example, 0.05 United States dollars is charged for 1 SMS.

The rate entity defines the rating conversion parameters and the type of the resource allocated or reported. Rate is applied to a single unit type or type of consumption resource such as time, volume, and unit. It can define the type of resource or consumption for which it applies.
The rate entity is dependent on the given factors:

li.p: Rate entity defines the granularity of the rating. For example, the rate is expressed as 5 KBs for 0.25 United States dollars. However, beyond this rate, it is important to identify the granularity of the charge. The granularity may be of a different quantity than that expressed in the rate. In this example, the granularity may be 512 bytes or 1/10 of 5 KBs.
Rate entity allows operators to define a step rate. For example, 0.05 United States dollars for the first 100 MB, and 0.03 United States dollars after that.
Operators can perform the following actions for the step rate entry:
Define the step rate entry duration in the units being rated.
There is no limit on the number of steps that can be defined in one rate.

section.title: Examples for Normal, Reflection cost, Fixed cost values

p.uicontrol: Normal: Rate to define a Normal step type to charge 1 Euro for every 10 MB usage

li.p: For first 100 MB consumption, 1 Euro is charged per 10 MB usage.
For the remaining part of the call, 0.5 Euro is charged per 10 MB usage.

p.uicontrol: Reflection cost: Rate to define a Normal step type to charge 0.25 Euro for every 10 MB usage for first 100 MB and then deduct the reflection cost = 1 Euro (in-between call); remaining call is charged with 0.05 Euro for every 10 MB usage

li.p: For first 100 MB consumption, 0.25 Euro is charged per 10 MB usage.
Reflection cost of 1 Euro is deducted, that is, for 0 duration and in-between the call.
For the remaining part of the call, 0.50 Euro is charged again per 10 MB usage.

p.uicontrol: Fixed cost: Rate to define a Normal step type to charge 0.025 Euro for every 10 MB usage for first 100 MB and then deduct Fixed cost = 10 Euro for 50 MB; remaining call is charged with 0.50 Euro for every 10 MB usage

li.p: For first 100 MB consumption, 0.25 Euro is charged per 10 MB usage.
Fixed cost of 10 Euro is deducted for 50 MB.
For the remaining part of the call, 0.50 Euro is charged again per 10 MB usage.
